author: jerenkrantz
msg: Try to make life better for bare bones FreeBSD installs.
* build/buildcheck.sh: Allow libtool15 to be used if libtool not found.
* autogen.sh: Allow libtoolize15 to be used; allow LIBTOOL_M4 environment
variable to dictate where the M4 file is (same as APR does).

author: fitz
msg: Zap stray spaces before and after —

author: fitz
msg: Update TODO and REVIEW as I knock items out.

author: fitz
msg: Update diff examples to the 'new' internal diff code output.  Since
the diff of this change is a diff of diff output, be careful looking
at the actual diff as it may cause your eyes to melt.

author: fitz
msg: Fix markup so that the foreword validates.  Also, the gui* tags come
out totally munged in the PDF output, so turn those into something
